DRSS_ADMINIDS.description: Admin ID(s), separate multiple with commas.

DRSS_BOT_TOKEN.description: Discord BOT token. Get it here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/.

DRSS_BOT_REDIRECTURI.description: Insert the domain name appending /authorize. Example on heroku: https://APPNAME.herokuapp.com/authorize. Make sure the exact url is also set set under the application OAuth2 tab under redirects.

DRSS_BOT_CLIENTID.description: App ID that can be found on the general information page at https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/. This should only contain numbers.

DRSS_BOT_CLIENTSECRET.description: Found on your app page at Discord Developers at https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/
